tweet_text:
@NoHolyScripture Consider: The USA slowly decided that citizens' rights apply to black people. Canada slowly decided the same for women and indigenous people. 
Would you say the bigots who fought the change were taking our democracies & our founding principles more seriously than the rest of us?

tweet_text: @May_Sanaee @TripleNcoffee @CFloodUrogyn But we’re not in an “existing” doctor/patient relationship anymore.
